# A brief introduction into urban morphology

---

::: {.r-fit-text .absolute top=39%}
What is urban morphology?
:::

---

> The study of the city as human habitat.

(Moudon, 1997)

::: {.fragment}

> The study of human settlements, their structure and the process of their formation and transformation.

(Kropf, 2017)

:::

::: {.fragment}

> The study of urban form.
:::

---

## What is urban morphometrics {.question}

> A study of urban form through the means of quantitative assessment of its constituent elements.
:::

[Conceptually similar to historico-geographical approach.]{.fragment}

[Methodologically embedded in spatial data science and geography.]{.fragment}

# Take home points

---

::: {.r-fit-text .absolute top=39%}
Times have changed. Methods have changed.<br>Concepts? Those only evolved.
:::

---

::: {.r-fit-text .absolute top=39%}
Urban morphology can be deeply embedded<br>in spatial data science.
:::

---

::: {.r-fit-text .absolute top=39%}
Urban morphometrics can support<br>quantitative studies done at scale.
:::

---

::: {.r-fit-text .absolute top=39%}
Structure of cities is deeply affected<br>by culture and politics.
:::


---

::: {.r-fit-text .absolute top=39%}
We can ask questions like never before.
:::
